name: Blind Monk Training (HEADPHONES REQUIRED)
description:
This game was made in 3,5 hours in order to be submitted in two (parallel) game jams:

#1 https://itch.io/jam/trijam-27

#2 https://itch.io/jam/zero-words-gamejam-2

HEADPHONES ARE REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME!

It is a simulation of a blind monks combat training. 

CONTROLS:

You use only two keys (S and K) to parry the attacks. Once you get assimilated with controls try to play it with your eyes closed for better immersion.

If it is too easy for you, try playing with one hand.

The game is short, it should take about 3-5 mins to finish it!

GL; HF
